work.name: World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO)
work.summary: Working as a machine learning software engineer intern, I am responsible for indexing and searching patent documents using neural search, and implementing machine learning models for OCR tasks.

work.name: VU Engineering
work.summary: Working as a machine learning engineer intern, I was responsible for developing and integrating the machine learning pipeline for the company's visual inspection system.

publications.name: Self Supervised Learning in Remote Sensing: Quantifying Approaches Effectiveness Across Downstream Tasks
publications.summary: Investigated on the effectiveness of self-supervised pretext tasks for different supervised downstream tasks, and demonstrated the effectiveness of contrastive learning in classification task and generative learning in segmentation task.

projects.name: Master Thesis
projects.summary: Proposed and implemented the ”SSL+AL” pre-training framework aimed at selecting subsets from the remote sensing dataset, to minimize computational expenses while improving downstream performance.

projects.name: Integrative Master’s Project
projects.summary: Conducted studies on existing secure & private aggregation methods, such as Homomorphic Secret Sharing (HSS) and Verifiable Homomorphic Secret Sharing (VHSS).

projects.name: Kaggle Coding Challenge
projects.summary: Developed a remote sensing image classification model using the PyTorch framework, and achieved a top 3 ranking out of 10 teams in the Kaggle competition.
